_sText:
This is the first map I've ever made for a game, so it's been really funny doing it. I made a zombie mod map because I play ZM very much. You can find me on LMRT server, I'm in their clan, which is a zombie mod clan so that's mostly why I made it. There are many spots on the map, and two secret areas. I hope you folks will enjoy play it, so I can be proud, hehe.
Comments and suggestions are always welcome!

By the way, thanks to the people who answered the questions I had, Kev_Boy and some members of the LMRT clan.
